| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
With an increasing number in the student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Excelsiors Squad was advised by [[Robert Drake (Earth-616)|Iceman]].{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

===Members===
* The members of this squad have not been identified yet.

===M-Day===
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Excelsiors Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}

| Notes                   = 
| Trivia                  = * The Excelsiors Squad was never seen fully on-panel.
